name: Dark Egypt
description: There is a legend about an ancient pyramid, great treasure and mighty emperor who was damned by the gods. Play as an archeologist studying the pyramid. The earthquake during the expedition blocked the entry. Try to find the exit... or search for the treasure of the Pharaoh? It's up to you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 7, 8.1, Vista, XP (32 and 64-bit) Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHz or equivalent processor Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compliant video card with 2GB-RAM and 192 bit or 256 bit DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 7, 8.1, Vista, XP (32 and 64-bit) Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible NVIDIA or AMD ATI video card with 2GB-RAM and 192 bit or 256 bit DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2000 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
